summary: Idk if I’m alone in this, but back when they moved and Dan said where they live now is not a forever home, I didn’t take it the...
question: Idk if I’m alone in this, but back when they moved and Dan said where they live now is not a forever home, I didn’t take it the way phandom did. Just before that live show I had read a lot of people saying they should buy a house because renting is stupid, they’re wasting their money etc. So I took that as Dan just informing those people that no they haven’t bought a house despite people thinking they should do so, gently trying to get people off their backs about how they spend their money. 1/2
answer:
“All this time it has bothered me a lot, because I wonder if I took it the wrong way or is forever home just another phrase phandom took and ran with, making it into something more meaningful than it actually is. 2/2”


“Oh and also people were congratulating them about their new place, so that’s another reason for saying it’s not a forever home. -forever home anon”

…

See, I took it more as “this is a transitional space. It’s not the end game, we won’t necessarily be here for a long time, it’s just for now, and something more permanent will come in the future.”

Which isn’t to say that I’m 100% convinced they’ll share their forever home. For all we know they could buy two houses and live separately with different partners or families or what have you. Anything is possible. I don’t think that “forever home” is Rick solid proof of anything. And I do think it’s another one of those situations where the Phandom over-romanticized something that was really quite normal.

reblog.comment:

“Oh and also people were congratulating them about their new place, so that’s another reason for saying it’s not a forever home. -forever home anon”

…

Anything is possible. I don’t think that “forever home” is Rick solid proof of anything. And I do think it’s another one of those situations where the Phandom over-romanticized something that was really quite normal.

…

Anything is possible. I don’t think that “forever home” is Rick solid proof of anything. summary: DO NOT HARASS DAN AND PHIL ABOUT THEIR PERSONAL LIFE. DO NOT ASK THEM INVASIVE QUESTIONS ABOUT THEIR RELATIONSHIP. AND MOST...
body:
i cant believe we still have to address these sorts of things but here we go:

DO NOT HARASS DAN AND PHIL ABOUT THEIR PERSONAL LIFE. DO NOT ASK THEM INVASIVE QUESTIONS ABOUT THEIR RELATIONSHIP. AND MOST IMPORTANTLY, DO NOT TAG THEM IN POSTS THAT HAVE ANYTHING TO DO WITH EXPLOITING THEIR RELATIONSHIP.

this is why they rarely share personal things with us. people take “shipping” too far and make it their number one priority to make sure they are together.

oomf has been going around saying things like “if dan and phil aren’t together i’m going to england and making them kiss” which is unacceptable. it’s gotten to the point where if i see them say something like that one more time i’m blocking them. and if you’re reading this, you know what you’ve done wrong now. don’t fucking do it again. it’s straight up annoying to have your fans play this fun guessing game on if two people are in a relationship or not. don’t. fucking. do. it. please. if you really care about dnp and their happiness, you would respect their privacy and not try to take shipping too far.

my point is,

don’t harass dan and phil about anything. if you were adored by millions of people and they were posting things about how “it would we do much better if you guys were together” you would be kind of pissed, right?


just don’t do it.

blog.name: phanfeed-ao3
blog.title: Phanfiction!
blog.description:
!!! READ THE FAQ BEFORE SENDING ME AN ASK !!!

Mobile Links

This blog is autoposts anything that gets put in the Dan Howell/Phil Lester tag on Archive of Our Own (AO3).

Sometimes the applet on IFTT I use straight up breaks. I don't recommend turning on notifications for this blog. Links don't work on mobile.

Admin: Ozzy (foolishdeadbeat)

summary: Screw the table, I'm nailing you.
title: Screw the table, I'm nailing you.
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2R5XyXc

by imnotinclinedtomaturity

Phil is out at the shops when their coffee table collapses beneath Dan’s legs. Aggravated, Dan tries to fix but it doesn’t go great. By the time Phil comes home, Dan is in a proper Mood. Based on the prompts “Welcome back. Now fucking help me, I’m gonna strangle you, and Oooh kinky.

blog.name: the-bitch-parade
blog.title: Dan Howell ruined my life
blog.description: DanGirl with a whole lot of opinions. if you take me seriously, I won't dissuade you.

title: Double Standards
body:
Dan: Ditching DINOF and changing his Youtube name to Daniel Howell
Phandom: WHAT? NO! YOU CAN’T DO THAT! YOU ARE A SELL OUT.
Phil: *RUMORED to change his Youtube name to Phil Lester*
Phandom: Smol bean, we support you! See ya never, AmazingPhil!

Why is it that the phandom is so biased and has a double standard when it comes to being supportive of DnP? Like, seriously…let’s discuss this because the more I visit some forums the more I notice that:
Phil can’t do no wrong and Dan is everything that’s wrong with the world.

Phil can’t do no wrong and Dan is everything that’s wrong with the world.
